      • exit

        void exit(boolean force)
        Closes service-server by ending all client requests if 'exit process' is not forced.
        Parameters:
        force - If set true service is closed forcefully, and If set false service is closed gracefully.

      • close

        void close()
           throws java.io.IOException
        Closes service-server by ending all client requests gracefully. same as exit(false)
        Specified by:
        close in interface java.io.Closeable
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
